com.simiacryptus.mindseye.layers.cudnn

Class CudaExecutionContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simiacryptus.mindseye.layers.cudnn.CuDNN
      • com.simiacryptus.mindseye.layers.cudnn.CudaExecutionContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NNExecutionContext

    public class CudaExecutionContext
extends CuDNN
implements NNExecutionContext
    An execution context subtype that communicates CuDNN-related GPU information. Used in combination with the layers in this package and the GPUTrainable component.
